name: Espresso Martini
description: The Espresso Martini is a cold, coffee-flavored cocktail made with vodka, espresso coffee, coffee liqueur, and sugar syrup. It is not a true martini.
directions: To make the syrup put the sugar in a small pan over medium heat and pour in 50ml water.
Stir the sugar and bring it to a boil. Turn off the heat and allow the syrup to cool.
Chill two martini glasses in the fridge
Pour 1 tbsp into a cocktail shaker along with a some of ice, the vodka, espresso, and coffee liqueur.
Shake until the outside of the cocktail shaker feels icy cold.
Strain into the chilled glasses. For decoration, you can put full coffee beans on top.
